author: Rhea Mahbubani
title: 'We underestimated it': An Italian woman urges Americans not to repeat the same mistake that left her home country vulnerable to becoming the new coronavirus epicenter
description: When the coronavirus outbreak was reported in Wuhan, most people in Italy didn't take the threat too seriously because China is "far, far away" and the infection itself seemed like the flu, Isabella Castoldi said. But as the COVID-19 virus reached Europe, peo…
content:
When news of the coronavirus first emerged, many people in Italy, Isabella Castoldi included, thought they were untouchable.
The COVID-19 virus originated in Wuhan, which is "very, very far away," Castoldi said. "We expected other countries that are much clo… [+5054 chars]
